++ Indistinguishable Content

IC is content that cannot be distinguished. IC has no barrier or limits between [Data]. This makes it easy to add irrelevant data. IC is difficult update, utilize and process because it cannot be found.
    * usually StaticData rather than LiveData

IC is prevented by disallowing its introduction in the first place. Limitless barriers mean that arbitary content is formed. [Standardization] can force correctness and HighStandards ensuring content is DistinguishedContent.

++Examples
    * instructions embedded into [Frontend]
    * translations
